top-gun-cat.title: Top Gun Cat
top-gun-cat.description:
The 1986 American movie is an action movie about fighting and winning against a country in the Indian Ocean supported by the Soviet Union during the Cold War.
It was inspired by Ehud Yonai's 1983 article, "Top Guns." Meanwhile, the top gun is a nickname for pilots who are good at close combat (dogfight) of fighter jets.

paragraph.intro: This is a sample project detail page for Top Gun Cat. It showcases the amazing adventures of a feline pilot.
paragraph.more_details: More exciting details about Top Gun Cat's missions will be added here soon!

image.caption: Our brave pilot, Top Gun Cat!
